comment: While she did have a few good moments, Haley is STILL aneo-con and establishment crony who advocated the very foreign policy positions that ran against. So good riddance!
amr:
# ::snt While she did have a few good moments, Haley is STILL aneo-con and establishment crony who advocated the very foreign policy positions that ran against. So good riddance!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Haley"))
                  :ARG1 (m2 / moment
                        :ARG1-of (g / good-02)
                        :quant (f / few)))
            :ARG2 (c2 / crony
                  :ARG0-of (a / advocate-01
                        :ARG1 (p2 / position-02
                              :ARG1 (p3 / policy-01
                                    :ARG2 (f2 / foreign))
                              :ARG1-of (r / run-10)
                              :mod (v / very)))
                  :mod (s / still)
                  :mod (o / old)))
      :snt2 (r2 / riddance
            :ARG1-of (g2 / good-02)
            :mod (s2 / so)))
